pricingRuleDescription:
Match the Featured Offer price, when offers are in the same fulfilment channel. Continue automated pricing after updating prices elsewhere.
Minimum ROI = 20% 
Minimum margin = 1€

Stay €0.01 below the lowest price, on all offers for the same ASIN and condition. Also compare with prices from retailers outside Amazon. Continue automated pricing after updating prices elsewhere.
Minimum ROI = 0% 
Minimum margin = 0€
